languages.text: "Я все еще не понимаю, как связано исчезновение звезды и культ Последнего восхода... почему деяние ксеносов спровоцировало исполнение пророчества Архиврага?"
"I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
languages.original_text: "Я все еще не понимаю, как связано исчезновение звезды и культ Последнего восхода... почему деяние ксеносов спровоцировало исполнение пророчества Архиврага?"

traits.locale_text: "I still don't understand the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... Why did an act of the xenos provoke the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still don't understand the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... Why did an act of the xenos provoke the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still don't understand the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... Why did an act of the xenos catalysed the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still don't understand the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... Why did an act of the xenos catalysed the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Sigo sin ver la relación entre la desaparición de la estrella y el Culto del Amanecer Final... ¿Por qué los xenos fueron el catalizador del cumplimiento de una profecía del Archienemigo?».
languages.original_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"

traits.locale_text: «Sigo sin entender la relación entre la desaparición de la estrella y el Culto del Amanecer Final... ¿Por qué un acto xenos fue el catalizador del cumplimiento de una profecía del Archienemigo?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vois toujours pas le rapport entre l'étoile disparue et le Culte de l'Aube finale... Comment les xénos ont-ils pu catalyser l'accomplissement de la prophétie du Grand Ennemi ? »
languages.original_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne comprends toujours pas le lien qui existe entre l'étoile disparue et le Culte de l'Aube finale... Comment les xénos ont-ils pu catalyser l'accomplissement de la prophétie du Grand Ennemi ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「我には、まだ消える星と最後の夜明け教団との関係性が理解できておりません…なぜ、異種族の行動が渾沌の勢力の予言成就の触媒となったのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"

traits.locale_text: 「我には、まだ消える星と最後の夜明け教団との関係性が理解できておりません…なぜ、異種族の行動が渾沌の勢力の予言成就の触媒となったのでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehe die Verbindung zwischen dem verschwindenden Stern und dem Kult der letzten Dämmerung noch immer nicht ... Wie können die Xenos die Erfüllung der Prophezeiung des Erzfeinds vorantreiben?"
languages.original_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe die Verbindung zwischen dem verschwindenden Stern und dem Kult der letzten Dämmerung noch immer nicht ... Warum hat ein Akt der Xenos die Erfüllung der Prophezeiung des Erzfeinds vorangetrieben?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我还是不明白，那颗行星的消失和‘终末黎明’教派之间到底有什么关系……？为什么那些异形的阴谋实现了混沌大敌的预言？”
languages.original_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"

traits.locale_text: “我还是不明白，那颗行星的消失和‘终末黎明’教派之间到底有什么关系……？为什么那些异形的阴谋实现了混沌大敌的预言？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bir yıldızın ortadan kaybolmasıyla Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın arasındaki bağlantıyı anlayamadım. Zenolar nasıl Şerbaşı'nın kehanetini gerçekleştirebilir?"
languages.original_text: "I still fail to see the connection between the disappearing star and the Cult of the Final Dawn... How could the xenos catalyse the fulfilment of the Archenemy's prophecy?"
